Desc.entry: A friendly family based club who aim to make kayaking accessible to everyone, young and old. Holds weekly sessions on the River Don and fortnightly indoor sessions which provide a warm and safe environment for those who might be beginners and also for the more advanced to practice. The club is very active socially and runs frequent trips.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Fri fortnightly at 7.30pm (pool session), please check website for dates, Sun at 9am (river session, Ball Bridge, near Kelham Island)
